data.title: [ Aigoo Lyrics ] Japanese Romanization Requests

If you are not a member of the ALT, please refrain from...
data.text:
o0o umm i have the song o__O;;. my friend got it from boajjang and sent it to me. i could upload it somewhere or something like that ^^;;.

Thank you for offering, but I have the song already It'd be difficult to try and romanize it by ear because it's hard to make out what she's saying sometimes And I'd really like to give you the correct lyrics instead of this mush I get from trying to do it by ear I'll be on the lookout for the Kanji If you happen to come across it yourself anytime soon, let me know

Here you go, sweettart88
